title: Pea 'guacamole' bruschetta

default: salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 slices crusty white bread, drizzled with olive oil and griddled both sides, to serve

steps: Place the peas, soya yoghurt, chilli flakes and seasoning into a mini blender and blitz until almost smooth.
To serve, spoon into a bowl with the griddled bread on the side.
